Package it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VirtualScreen
    Represents a generic 2D virtual screen in front of the user.
    VirtualScreenInitializer
    Classes implementing this interface will have to initialize the VirtualScreen parameters (namely size and depth).
    VirtualScreenInitializer.InitializerCallback  
    VirtualScreenListener
    This interface is implemented by classes who want to be updated on each frame about the 2D hand positions projected on the virtual screen
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractVirtualScreen
    Implements the common functionality of a VirtualScreen
    AbstractVirtualScreenInitializer
    Provides a base implementation, taking care of thread management and callback notification.
    HandData
    Represents data about a specific hand.
    VirtualScreenManager
    Singleton that manages the virtual screen.
